definition: various notes or records/a miscellany/scattered jottings
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: The inscriptive writings are attaches after the certain carrier the short nimble miscellany prose.
sentences.chinese: “题跋”是附于一定载体之后的短小灵活的杂记散文。

sentences.english: The author has investigated systematically the different versions of "Miscellanies at Banqiao" and their circulation.
sentences.chinese: 本文系统考察了《板桥杂记》的各种刊本与流传过程。

sentences.english: Shall we go to watch an acrobatic show?
sentences.chinese: 我们去观看杂记表演，好吗？

sentences.english: In his Miscellanies, the ideal was the attainment of uninterrupted communion with God.
sentences.chinese: 在他的杂记，理想是实现不间断地与上帝。

definition: anecdote/lost or apocryphal story about famous person
Notes on a Minutely Observed Thatched Hut by Ji Yun 紀昀|纪昀[Ji4 Yun2], novel of the supernatural/The Thatched Study of Close Scrutiny
pinyin: Yue4 wei1 Cao3 tang2 Bi3 ji4

definition: what one has seen and heard/knowledge/one's experience
